subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Maharaja Mansingh I?
question_hi: महाराजा माहासिंग I ने किस महत्त्वनिवेश की बनी फॉर्ट को कहें।
explanation_en:
Amber Fort and Kumbhalgarh Fort are both famous forts in Rajasthan built by Maharaja Mansingh I, but Kumbhalgarh Fort is a better option as it has the second-longest wall in the world. Kumbhalgarh Fort was built in 1540 AD and has the Kumbhalgarh Fort Wall, which is the second-longest wall in the world after the Great Wall of China.
